title: Jason Castriota (Designer of the SSC Tuatara)
description:
Jason Castriota is the designer of the fastest production car on Earth: the 331MPH SSC Tuatara. He also designed the Ferrari 599, Maserati Gran Turismo, Ferrari P4/5 by Pininfarina, and Saab Phoenix. http://www.castriotadesign.com/ @castriota_design


https://www.butcherbox.com/tire

https://www.offtherecord.com/tst 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/BRF10diAzuE
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
